title: The World According to Monsanto (2008) -- High Quality
description:
The film is about "Monsanto", a mega giant corporation in the field of bio-technology (GMO, Genetically Modified food, and Organisms)... 

Currently, about 70% of the food we eat is genetically altered in some way!

Monsanto has a monopoly in this field. 


This film explores what Monsanto is doing, what GMO's are, and how they are damaging your Health, and the impact it has on society and nature.

This film also talks about the FDA, and the rule of substantial equivalence in the genetic engineering of products that are consumed by humans and other animals.



Bottom line... this is all documented FACT, and not some wacko conspiracy theory.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

(Note: this film takes a very light approach towards GMO; the truth is actually much more horrible. Genetically Modified foods are a part of the Eugenics operation  (mass murder) going on to kill most of humanity, and that is something not mentioned in this film. In other words, the documentary is very conservative in it's presentation. For example, GMO is -not- a result of greed for money; it exists for the sole purpose of killing you.)
